pr_title: Improve stream extractor tests & various fixes

timeline.bodyText: Why are you using a regex for conferences while using substring() for API URLs here and using URL#getPath() + substring() for non-API URLs here?
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: I left everything as it was before, I only replaced the hardcoded url. Will fix this
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: Please also handle the API URLs in getId() here
timeline.author: wb9688
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -31,7 +32,7 @@ public String getUrl(String id, List<String> contentFilters, String searchFilter
     @Override

replies.bodyText: Fixed while rebasing with the latest changes about accounts and channels
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: Please also handle the API URLs in getId() here
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: Oh right, for some reason I thought they were already being handled in some strange way
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
Those are already handled by the regex: /videos/(watch/)?([^/?&#]*)
Both "framatube.org/api/v1/videos/id" and "framatube.org/videos/id" match it and the second group is obtained correctly
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.author: wb9688
wb9688

replies.bodyText: So that it also catches NullPointerExceptions, which are generated when there is no error message. In that case null should be returned
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: Then why aren't you catching (ParsingException | NullPointerException e)?
replies.author: B0pol

timeline.bodyText: Could be final, just like a lot of variables in this class
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: Ok, will fix this in all modified files
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.message: [Test] Optimize imports

[YouTube] Fix livestream test actually having video streams

Also fix description test that was not valid anymore
[MediaCCC] Return empty list of video-only streams instead of null
[MediaCCC] Return empty list of video-only streams instead of null
[MediaCCC] Return empty list of video-only streams instead of null

timeline.message: [Test] Add sub channel name, url and thumbnail tests
[Test] Add sub channel name, url and thumbnail tests
[YouTube] Consider dates as GMT and not as local
[YouTube/MediaCCC] Consider dates as GMT and not as local
[YouTube/MediaCCC] Consider dates as GMT and not as local

[PeerTube] Change age restricted video in tests

The old one wasn't available anymore

[Test] Add base classes for stream extractor tests

Refactor all stream extractor tests to use new base class.

Remove check if upload date is in the past: this does not have to hold true: youtube premieres turn up in search results even though they are in the future
[YouTube] Fix error message obtaining when there is none
[YouTube] Return 0 when there is no timestamp, not -2, as per javadoc

[YouTube] Fix frame extraction for livestreams

Use saved playerResponse instead of parsing json every time

[SoundCloud] Return empty video stream list instead of null

Also replace every instance of `return new ArrayList<>();` with `return Collections.emptyList();`
[PeerTube] Return empty audio stream list instead of null
[PeerTube] Fix link handler inconsistency providing API links
[PeerTube] Parse timestamp from url (previously unimplemented)
[MediaCCC] Fix link handler inconsistency providing API links
[MediaCCC] Extract tags

[MediaCCC] Return null instead of empty items collector

As per the documentation in the base getRelatedStreams()
[PeerTube] Prepend "accounts/" to channel id for backward compatibility
[PeerTube] Improve channel and stream link handler tests
[MediaCCC] Use regex to parse stream and conference urls
[MediaCCC] Add tests for stream and conference link handlers

[MediaCCC] Use final when possible, ide refactorings

Refactorings on `throws` clause
[PeerTube] Use final when possible, ide refactorings
[SoundCloud] Use final when possible, ide refactorings
[YouTube] Use final when possible

[YouTube] Do not catch every exception on getErrorMessage

@B0pol suggestion
[PeerTube] Test one channel url with api and one without
[MediaCCC] Return empty list of video-only streams instead of null
[Test] Improve code style and add final
[Test] Add stream metadata tests
[Test] Add sub channel name, url and thumbnail tests
[YouTube/MediaCCC] Consider dates as GMT and not as local
[Test] Add stream dash mpd url test

[PeerTube] Change age restricted video in tests

The old one wasn't available anymore

[YouTube] Replace outdated PewDiePie video test with another one

The old video was made private, and this video (wedding) is probably never going to be removed.

[YouTube] Replace outdated PewDiePie video test with another one

The old video was made private, and this video (wedding) is probably never going to be removed.

timeline.author: TobiGr
TobiGr

timeline.bodyText: Did you test against NewPipe this part? Will it create NullPointerException or there is already a null check?
timeline.author: B0pol

replies.bodyText: This was done as per the documentation in the base getRelatedStreams(), and also to prevent creating new objects at random. I tested in NewPipe and it works as expected (there are null checks), but the code which takes care of it being null actually lies in the extractor, where the collector is turned into a list. I now added @nullable to all of the functions, as it was missing.
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: Oh, and also, YouTube already returns null for age restricted videos.
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: Could you explain why 0x100 <= formatId < 0x1000 and also above (video streams) or below (subtitles) and add comments for it?
timeline.author: B0pol

timeline.message: Add some missing finals and nullables
Add some missing finals, nullables and comments
Add some missing finals, nullables and comments
